lead_paragraph: MONDAY EVENING.--The vague feeling of gloom noticed in the stock markets for the last few days has again increased, and a further decline has taken place of a quarter per cent. Consols, which left off on Saturday at 95 1/4 to 96, opened this morning at 95 1/4 to 95 7/8, and soon receded to 95 5/8 to 95 3/4, at which they remained until the termination of business.
